knimeNode.name: SAMLoader
knimeNode.shortDescription: SAMLoader - loads a SAM file and a fastA file

fullDescription.intro: SAMLoader loads an alignment file (SAM) and a reference genome file (fastA) to run other nodes, that need these files, e.g. SAM2BAM.
fullDescription.option: Please select a reference file in fastA format.
Please select a alignment file in SAM format.
